bibl.title: Old Cairo: Fortress into City.
bibl.note: The Old Cairo Archaeological Project, 1989-1994. Archival research on the late Roman fortifications at Babylon (Old Cairo) and excavations around the south gate of the fortress.
bibl.seg: LE QUESNE Charles, Old Cairo: Fortress into City.
Egyptian Archaeology 7 (1995) pp. 3-5, 3 figg. n./bl., 1 fig. coul.
The Old Cairo Archaeological Project, 1989-1994. Archival research on the late Roman fortifications at Babylon (Old Cairo) and excavations around the south gate of the fortress.
